name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant red body, inspired by the color 'rossoCorsa', and retro console buttons, Circuit brings a nostalgic touch to the digital world. Its classic arms and legs allow it to traverse various terrains with ease. Equipped with a snake-themed screen and a helmet add-on, Circuit is always ready to analyze and interpret complex data. With its ability to visualize waveforms and electrical signals, Circuit serves as the go-to assistant for troubleshooting and problem-solving. Its advanced intelligence and precision make it an invaluable asset to the WebtrES club.
